benchmark_name: Synthetic Test Article: Regulatory Cascades Linking GENE_A to Inflammatory Disease Pathophysiology

GENE_A.note: Upstream regulator discussed in inflammatory contexts.

PROTEIN_X.note: Activated downstream of GENE_A; component of PATHWAY_P.

PATHWAY_P.note: Immune regulation pathway containing PROTEIN_X; activates PROTEIN_Y.

PROTEIN_Y.note: Downstream target of PATHWAY_P; modulates inflammatory transcriptional program.

DISEASE_D.note: Disease whose severity/progression is associated with inflammatory and metabolic stress signals.

PROTEIN_Z.note: Core component of PATHWAY_Q; speculated to influence inflammatory signaling.

PATHWAY_Q.note: Metabolic adaptation pathway regulating metabolic stress responses.

METABOLIC_STRESS.note: Cellular metabolic stress response under hypoxia; correlated with DISEASE_D progression.

DRUG_R.note: Selectively inhibits PROTEIN_Y; reduces inflammatory transcription and signaling.

GENE_C.note: Proposed transcriptional regulator with limited evidence for involvement with PATHWAY_P.
